name: JHANJHA UNNAYAN SAMITY

address: VILL- JHANJHA, P.O- PROTAPPUR, P.S- HARIHARPARA,

briefDescription: This foundation is working within 58 villages out of10 G.P. areas of Hariharpara Block of Murshidabad District. Mainly this organization is providing help for the disable children. Besides the divorcee,widows and old aged persons and needy students are benefited.457 nos. of disable children provided formal education. Within a short period the organization will expand activities all over the District.It has a Vocational Training Unit, through this rehabilitation is done. Near about 700 families are benefited from this foundation. It has also activities on environment and games and sports.
